args.command: cd ${fileDirname} && (echo '/**'; echo ' *    author:  mackerel38'; echo " *    created: $(date '+%d.%m.%Y %H:%M:%S')"; echo '**/'; echo; oj-bundle -I /workspaces/competitive/library ${file}) > ${fileDirname}/bundled.cpp && acc submit ${fileDirname}/bundled.cpp -- -y && cd /workspaces/competitive || cd /workspaces/competitive
